remarks: The trivial absolute value.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2015.)
statement:
abvtriv.a $e |- A = ( AbsVal ` R ) $.
abvtriv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
abvtriv.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
abvtriv.f $e |- F = ( x e. B |-> if ( x = .0. , 0 , 1 ) ) $.
abvtrivd.1 $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
abvtrivd.2 $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
abvtrivd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( y e. B /\ y =/= .0. ) /\ ( z e. B /\ z =/= .0. ) ) -> ( y .x. z ) =/= .0. ) $.
abvtrivd $p |- ( ph -> F e. A ) $.
$d .0. x $.
$d .x. x $.
$d B x $.
$d F y z $.
$d R x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
